content.prompt: Sri Lanka and Australia have about the same population. What data would help you determine which country has a higher physiological population density?

choices.label: The number of farmers in each country
The total fertility rate of each country
The amount of arid land in each country
The amount of arable land in each country

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
